alert.note: Alert for Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Western Kiowa County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 1:25PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Prowers, central Kiowa and northeastern Bent Counties through 230 PM MDT... At 125 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Neegronda Reservoir, or 16 miles northwest of Lamar, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Eads, Neeoshe Reservoir, Neegronda Reservoir, Sweetwater Reservoir and Queens Reservoir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
